# (Danny) From my observation, there appears to be a relatively even distribution of happiness levels between both females and males, and it appears to show across all the education levels. 
```{r}
#explore 4 variables
ggplot(data = happy, aes(x = happy, fill = sex, color=as.factor(sex))) +
  geom_bar() + 
  facet_grid(. ~ degree)
```
